comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: the winter carnival history list didn't keep track of the queens way back then. hard to say what year, but her official title would be "Queen of the Snows", the King would be Borias Rex.  The ice blocks were cut from local lakes and use to construct castles and walls. some quite elaborate and large in certain years.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
29079609@N02
comment._content:
thanks for the legwork.  I bet they would appreciate this.  An ice fort was probably just that, a 1 story maze type structure.  The carnival ends with the dethroning of Boreas by Vulcan, so perhaps there was a staged battle here.  Harriet Island is often a site for Winter Carnival festivities, I attended the Vulcan rally on Harriet Island a couple years ago there.  Here they have captured some of the royal guards
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/29079609@N02/6776951091/sizes/l/in/photolist-bjRDsk-bk2yoD-bqK9nc-88cjvy-brDx1a-bkwZCK-bqXZ9B-88ciZ1-9FVVyk-bmcyN4-7W68bM-8TL1jm-9GEdrF/]
